item.title: Thieving exp?
item.dc:creator: @DeCryptification DeCryptification
item.description:
@DeCryptification wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Let’s take a look at the parameters the ThiefStall method uses…

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote)

So, in your first stall, “General Stall” is the stall name.
“and recieve 1k” is what it says after you steal from the stall.
1 is the level needed to steal from the stall.
75*playerLevel[17] is the XP given (it’s 75 multiplied by the player’s theiving level)
995 is the item added (995 is money)
1000 is the amount of the item added (1k)
0x340 is the emote played (the bend over, steal from stall emote)[/quote]

That’s the answer right there and if you can’t figure out what it means, you shouldn’t be coding rsps.

Read full topic

item.title: Thieving exp?
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Let’s take a look at the parameters the ThiefStall method uses…

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote)

So, in your first stall, “General Stall” is the stall name.
“and recieve 1k” is what it says after you steal from the stall.
1 is the level needed to steal from the stall.
75*playerLevel[17] is the XP given (it’s 75 multiplied by the player’s theiving level)
995 is the item added (995 is money)
1000 is the amount of the item added (1k)
0x340 is the emote played (the bend over, steal from stall emote)

Thats now what i ment, what i ment to say is that what experience should i recieve so you dont get 99 thieving super fast, but just perfect. And what level for like each Stall. And how much money each stall should get. Thanks.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Thieving exp?
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

What should be the rate of exp to get from these stalls? And how much cash? Please help with this.

if(objectID == 4876){
TheifStall(“general stall”, “and receive 1k”, 1, 75playerLevel[17], 995, 1000, 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 4877){
TheifStall(“mage stall”, “and receive 2.5k”, 10, 650playerLevel[15], 995, 2500, 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 4878){
TheifStall(“scimitar stall”, “and recieve 3k”, 15, 650playerLevel[17], 995, 3000, 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 2560){
TheifStall(“silk stall”, “and recieve 5k”, 30, 640playerLevel[17], 995, 5000, 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 2565){
TheifStall(“silver stall”, “and recieve 7k”, 50, 950playerLevel[17], 995, 7000, 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 2562){
TheifStall(“gem stall”, “and recieve 10k”, 75, 35playerLevel[17], 995, 10000, 0x340);
}
